price: 84.  Ne sois donc pas pressé (de voir s’abattre sur eux le supplice), Nous tenons rigoureusement le compte de (leurs méfaits).
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
